name: Island Heart
description:
Island Heart is inspired by a range of virtual pet  games and zen/gardening games. We are aiming to launch a polished version on Google Play store in the near future so any comments would be greatly appreciated.

The gameplay is just sandbox right now but we plan to add music-based achievements and a slew of cosmetic character options.

Emulate the touchscreen input with your mouse on PC or download the .apk on your Android to play, but you'll need to enable the installation of 3rd party apps in device settings.
